CustomField.formula: TRIM( LEFT( IF(INCLUDES(MVN_Missing_Information__c, "Patient Name"), "Patient Name,",null) & IF(INCLUDES(MVN_Missing_Information__c, "Patient Date of Birth"), "Patient Date of Birth,",null) & IF(INCLUDES(MVN_Missing_Information__c, "Patient Address"), "Patient Address,",null) & IF(INCLUDES(MVN_Missing_Information__c, "Patient Gender"), "Patient Gender,",null) & IF(INCLUDES(MVN_Missing_Information__c, "Start Form"), "Start Form,",null) & IF(INCLUDES(MVN_Missing_Information__c, "Diagnosis Code"), "Diagnosis Code,",null) & IF(INCLUDES(MVN_Missing_Information__c, "Physician Signature"), "Physician Signature,",null) & IF(INCLUDES(MVN_Missing_Information__c, "Physician Signature Date"), "Physician Signature Date,",null) , LEN( IF(INCLUDES(MVN_Missing_Information__c, "Patient Name"), "Patient Name,",null) & IF(INCLUDES(MVN_Missing_Information__c, "Patient Date of Birth"), "Patient Date of Birth,",null) & IF(INCLUDES(MVN_Missing_Information__c, "Patient Address"), "Patient Address,",null) & IF(INCLUDES(MVN_Missing_Information__c, "Patient Gender"), "Patient Gender,",null) & IF(INCLUDES(MVN_Missing_Information__c, "Start Form"), "Start Form,",null) & IF(INCLUDES(MVN_Missing_Information__c, "Diagnosis Code"), "Diagnosis Code,",null) & IF(INCLUDES(MVN_Missing_Information__c, "Physician Signature"), "Physician Signature,",null) & IF(INCLUDES(MVN_Missing_Information__c, "Physician Signature Date"), "Physician Signature Date,",null) ) - 1))
CustomField.label: Missing Information Formula
